string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Six players won the NBA scoring title for three or more consecutive years. Who were they?
What is Hot sauce"s real name?
What franchise went through a 45 year drought before winning an NBA championship?
What were the first baskets made of?
The famous street ball court, Rucker Park, is in which New York neighborhood?
How many rules did the game initially have?
In 1976–77 which franchise traded away Bob McAdoo and Moses Malone?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: Micheal Jordan, Wilt Chamberlain, George Gervin, Neil Johnson, Bob McAdoo, George Mikan
